display_long_description:
# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal. 
[media]
[media]
Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
[media]
[media]
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
[media]
[media]
There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]

# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75443251_612261381345182_5674533115764706962_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=EyTSjrbUGQsQ7kNvwF0i1De&_nc_oc=AdkbegMwFRg1s-zkfFVn8sxc_cHZWFdwj8GVdvOvcsD07NhpQda4aCi3hDrICzkRcyk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=DHJPKUlyDfX-JU-dpLJV7g&oh=00_AfsfrkeNPWJp1BYxPgykBX-kHmhHtIPqyartg5Yu41wr-g&oe=698EA2C0)
Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001714_1507974673219564_1452701867122163118_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=u4d87rknULwQ7kNvwGzFMDS&_nc_oc=Adlg2UZawU9Rv0rcvjf8dfAgsz0Hmstd91fkMaRu-yBpFlRDaQi367qTQYTJcc-6eO8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=DHJPKUlyDfX-JU-dpLJV7g&oh=00_AfstUjyo2DN00-bKm8ZKx-ldvSM5cQIaq4r5Pd4-foXynA&oe=698EC9B8)
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75302218_2068538016921333_8411850603412514976_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=_QxCLY-QsVsQ7kNvwG85pl7&_nc_oc=AdmgB9yP4wFFmFDRTU-9FB3KDGtXbUgx295IAAJdSd3P6J4gH3mH-NZ2V7XfoZEI9rQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=DHJPKUlyDfX-JU-dpLJV7g&oh=00_Afu7A_70wFgoghv1tm7DY4RlxPg-tjTLBs4EzwGr7fck1Q&oe=698ECF24)
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031422_997444645745145_5320263794737829877_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=9I0r-3YIK_wQ7kNvwFlBCEX&_nc_oc=AdkMLSLYt274mNsDaLuHAI-7NePhnsqXgl8JMN2SlKT0kTLRXKSykS7YruT33qEdqUk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=DHJPKUlyDfX-JU-dpLJV7g&oh=00_AftEg7HzanPGZdr85KCIiWAYkInId__INXR24SqYKi8uGg&oe=698EBF4E)

There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
